Course: LBS 210 – Mathematical Reasoning & Proof

Learning Session (≈3 hrs)

Practice (≈6 hrs)

  2. Proof Warm‑ups (2 hrs) — Short direct proofs with sets

  4. Reflection (1 hr) — What makes a proof clear?
